blog.description: Writing and Stuff from Isaac Z. Schlueter
blog.name: izs
blog.title: blog.izs.me

body:
shown to be far more ergonomic.
the bottom to top writing direction was
Reviled and ridiculed at first,

it became apparent this was not ideal.
on monitor screens,
Displaying text in streams

all written down from the top.
languages of the ancients were
Developed for paints in hand,
